title: A New Year's Resolution: Be Thankful - Gregway
description:
Every day in 2014, Greg's going to thank someone for making his life better. #365thanks

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/MERCH: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Leave your questions for Greg as a video response and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverG...

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to Game Over Greggy it's Nick I'm here on the new set for the Game Over Greggy show it's this podcast we put up every Friday on Bandcamp for a dollar then for free on YouTube every Monday just watch the free version it's fun um but on the latest episode uh we talked about New Year's resolutions and I came up with a dumb one that I wanted to Platinum Persona 4 Golden on the Vita and I'm still going to do that that's still happening but I came up with something else the other day when I was thinking about it you see on the internet um there's a lot of hate a lot of lot of jerks a lot of mean people and like sometimes you know I don't I'm not a jerk at least I try not to be I mean some people would say I am but people will tweet at me and be mean to me and I'll waste my time you know calling them a troll or retweeting them and letting everybody see the dumb stuff I have to put up with right but then once and I'll block them of course I don't care about them after

my time you know calling them a troll or retweeting them and letting everybody see the dumb stuff I have to put up with right but then once and I'll block them of course I don't care about them after that fact but then people always point out to me you know why are you giving time to these people who are jerks why why do you care about them there's literally a 100,000 people who want to talk to you or want to have an interaction with you that's positive and that's a good point like I need to be a bit more positive I feel in the cuz I'm I'm a pretty positive guy to begin with but I want to make sure I'm reflecting that and not rewarding the creeps or whatever right so I'm starting something here here's my new New Year's resolution all right this is going to start on January 1st as most New Year's resolutions uh they do and what it's going to be is #365thanks uh what it's going to be and I I urge you to join me once you hear what it is right every day for the year of 2014 I'm going

Year's resolution uh they do and what it's going to be is #365thanks uh what it's going to be and I I urge you to join me once you hear what it is right every day for the year of 2014 I'm going to Tweet on my Game Over Greggy, please give me a sub over there follow I think they call him @NickScarpino I'm going to Tweet a thank you to a real person to a real thing not a blanket man thanks to all the fans for doing this whatever I'm going to Tweet specific people on how they've made my life better because I want to make sure that I'm not just promoting bad guys right or not and granted don't get me wrong most my tweets aren't about the bad guys but I want to make sure that I'm thanking the people in my life as much as I you know do in my head right I would say thank you so much for watching these shows subscribing following y y y you mean the world to me but I want to go out of my way in 2014 to thank the people who you know make life worth living if that doesn't sound too corny even though it

subscribing following y y y you mean the world to me but I want to go out of my way in 2014 to thank the people who you know make life worth living if that doesn't sound too corny even though it kind of does so you know give me give me the follow over there and look every day for the hashtag #365thanks or no thanks wait what I do #365thanks we're done period hash #365thanks so yeah it should be a fun year 2014 I'm super excited to share it with you of course do more YouTube content here on GameOverGreggy.com go to the Bandcamp thing go do more t-shirts all the crazy stuff of course do more stuff on IGN do up at noon thanks so much for giving me a job um but that's the that's the thrust of it I'm pretty excited about 2014 I hope you are too uh remember if you want to keep up on everything I'm doing make sure you subscribe to the channel here like this video and then make sure you tell me in the comments below if you're going to join my #365thanks campaign uh use the same hashtag let's get it

make sure you subscribe to the channel here like this video and then make sure you tell me in the comments below if you're going to join my 365 thanks campaign uh use the same hashtag let's get it going I don't want I don't I mean I don't care about the trending thing that doesn't matter to me but I want to make sure that you know you're thanking people too why aren't we all more positive people we probably should be and that's what we're going to do until next time make sure you hug Portillo nice and tight
